title: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook the spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente.
Fry pancetta with garlic until crispy, then remove garlic.
Whisk eggs with Parmesan in a bowl.
Drain pasta and mix immediately with pancetta.
Remove from heat and quickly stir in egg mixture to form a creamy sauce.
Season with black pepper and serve.

title: Chicken Stir-Fry
description: Quick and healthy stir-fried chicken with vegetables in a savory sauce.
instructions: Slice chicken and vegetables into thin strips.
Mix soy sauce, oyster sauce, and cornstarch in a small bowl.
Heat oil in a wok and stir-fry garlic until fragrant.
Add chicken and cook until browned.
Add vegetables and stir-fry for 3–4 minutes.
Pour in sauce and stir until everything is well coated.
Serve hot with rice or noodles.

title: Chocolate Lava Cake
description: Rich chocolate cake with a gooey molten center, perfect for dessert lovers.
instructions: Preheat oven to 200°C (390°F) and grease ramekins with butter and cocoa powder.
Melt chocolate and butter together until smooth.
Whisk eggs, yolks, and sugar until thick and pale.
Fold in melted chocolate mixture.
Sift in flour and mix gently.
Pour batter into ramekins and bake for 10–12 minutes.
Serve immediately with ice cream or berries.

title: Vegetable Soup
description: A hearty and healthy soup packed with fresh vegetables and herbs.
instructions: Chop all vegetables into bite-sized pieces.
Heat olive oil in a large pot and sauté onion, carrot, and celery until softened.
Add garlic, potatoes, zucchini, and tomatoes and cook for 5 minutes.
Pour in vegetable broth, add thyme and bay leaf, then bring to a boil.
Reduce heat and simmer for 25 minutes until vegetables are tender.
Season with salt and pepper.
Garnish with fresh parsley before serving.
